## This room will be closed and archived.
** @/all Please move discussion of this topic to our forum, or to one of the official Free Code Camp chat rooms: http://forum.freecodecamp.com/t/free-code-camp-official-chat-rooms/19390**

-----

-----

-----

This is a chat room designed specifically for discussing concepts in the book “The War of Art”. 
This book deals mainly with issues in human nature that cause procrastination.
Here’s a link to the book: http://www.amazon.com/War-Art-Steven-Pressfield-ebook/dp/B007A4SDCG
